item.title: Long-Term Design Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented Graphic Design Assistant to support our design team with various tasks, including product packaging, website design, basic video editing, and more. The ideal candidate should have experience in print design and be proficient in using Shopify, Photoshop, and Illustrator.

Responsibilities:

-Assist in the design and development of product packaging.
-Create visually appealing website designs and graphics.
-Perform basic video editing for promotional content.
-Design quick ads and graphics for marketing campaigns.
-Ensure consistency and alignment with the brand’s visual identity.
-Collaborate with the marketing team to develop creative concepts.
-Prepare files for print production.
-Maintain and update the company’s Shopify store with new graphics and designs.



Hourly Range: $35.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:02 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Web Design, Print Design, Advertising Design, Adobe Photoshop, Shopify, Video Editing & Production
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Web Design, Print Design, Advertising Design, Adobe Photoshop, Shopify, Video Editing & Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Roblox Automated YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I own a popular Roblox YouTube channel with over 800,000 subscribers, and am looking for someone to help automate this. I'm seeking talented Video Editors, Script Writers, Voiceover Artists, and Content Finders who are passionate about Roblox and have experience in creating engaging content for a younger audience.

Roles and Responsibilities:

1. Video Editors:

Edit and produce high-quality videos from raw gameplay footage and other assets.
Add engaging graphics, animations, and effects to enhance the content.
Ensure videos are well-paced and align with our brand style.
Work collaboratively with the script writers and voiceover artists to ensure a cohesive final product.
Deliver videos in a timely manner, adhering to deadlines.
2. Script Writers:

Develop compelling and entertaining scripts for our Roblox gameplay videos.
Research trending topics and popular games within the Roblox community to create relevant content.
Write clear and engaging dialogue that resonates with our target audience.
Collaborate with the team to refine and improve scripts based on feedback.
Ensure scripts are creative, original, and maintain the channel’s tone and style.
3. Voiceover Artists:

Provide energetic and captivating voiceovers for our Roblox videos.
Bring the scripts to life with personality and enthusiasm.
Ensure clear and professional audio quality in recordings.
Collaborate with the team to match voiceovers with the video content seamlessly.
Ability to adapt and take direction to match the desired tone and pacing.
Requirements:

Video Editors:

Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
Strong portfolio showcasing previous video editing work, preferably in gaming or entertainment.
Creative eye for detail and storytelling through video.
Knowledge of YouTube best practices and trends.
Script Writers:

Excellent writing and storytelling skills.
Experience writing scripts for YouTube videos or similar content.
Understanding of Roblox and its community.
Ability to create engaging content for a younger audience.
Strong research skills to stay updated with trends.
Voiceover Artists:

Clear and engaging vocal delivery.
Experience in voiceover work, preferably for YouTube or similar platforms.
High-quality recording equipment and environment.
Ability to convey excitement and enthusiasm.

If one person can fill this position, let me know in your proposal.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 16:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Scripting, Animation, YouTube Development, Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Scripting, Animation, YouTube Development, Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, YouTube Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Voiceover Slideshow Presentation - Upwork
item.description:
Glimmer Tours is seeking a skilled video editor to synchronize an existing slideshow presentation with a provided voiceover.

Responsibilities:

- Match the slideshow presentation with the voiceover.
- Ensure smooth transitions and synchronization.
- Deliver a polished final video.

If you believe you are a good fit for this job, please apply. We look forward to hearing from you.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 16:25 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
